title: COVID Shot Triggers Unwanted Physiological Changes
cleaned_text:
(NaturalHealth365) In the latest round of updated COVID-19 data that the mainstream media might be reluctant to share, a recent study straight out of Ground Zero – the Wuhan Institute of Virology (WIV) in Wuhan, China – has revealed that getting the COVID shot has a “consistent” effect on someone’s immune health.

The effect? Making a person’s immune system more vulnerable. As public health officials continue to ramp up their COVID test and N95 disbursement efforts, let’s pay close attention to when and whether evidence like this will be properly acknowledged and discussed.

CAUTION: Getting the COVID shot causes “consistent pathophysiological alterations” in the human immune system

The study in question was published in October 2021 in Cell Discovery and conducted by Chinese researchers from WIV.

It’s important to know in this case, the researchers used a vaccine available in China called VeroCell. According to the World Health Organization (WHO), VeroCell “is an inactivated vaccine … which [stimulates] the production of antibodies and [makes] the body ready to respond to an infection with live SARS-CoV-2. This vaccine is adjuvanted (with aluminum hydroxide), to boost the response of the immune system.”

While the WIV study is small and includes only 11 participants, it did generate some alarming conclusions regarding COVID shot safety. By assessing kidney function, blood work, and other metrics in the participants, the researchers determined that the shots clearly “mimicked an infection” with SARS-CoV-2 and led to “consistent alterations in gene expression of many different immune cell types.”

“These data,” the authors write, “suggested that after vaccination, at least by day 28, other than generation of neutralizing antibodies, people’s immune systems, including those of lymphocytes and monocytes, were perhaps in a more vulnerable state.”

They continue (with our emphasis added): “Our study postulates that it is imperative to consider the potential long-term impact of vaccination to certain medical conditions or to general human health.”

This study also adds context to the official position of the European Medicines Agency (EMA), who earlier this month stated that repeated COVID booster shots could impair immune response and lack feasibility as a public health measure.

Growing evidence of negative immune health effects caused by COVID shot raises yet another important ethical question that public health officials seem unwilling to address

Let’s unpack this scenario a bit more clearly:

Here we have one of several scientific studies presenting evidence that COVID shots – which currently lack any and all long-term safety data – are associated with “dramatic changes in immune cell gene expression” that could actually impair a person’s immunity, especially if that person has one or more chronic health conditions.

Next, we need to consider an interesting trend in drug studies:

Usually, only young and healthy volunteers are recruited to participate in clinical drug trials that purport to assess the safety and efficacy of a drug (as was the case for this study from WIV). Yet the majority of people who would be expected to take the drug – including a whopping 6 in 10 American adults with at least one chronic disease and nearly 43% of American adults with obesity, according to the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) – are either older than 65 or not healthy by most definitions.

This brings up an important question:

If a growing amount of evidence suggests that COVID shots could plausibly cause long-term harm to immune health, particularly in people with chronic health conditions, isn’t it unethical to coerce American citizens into taking them since the majority of these citizens live with at least one chronic health issue?

Heart disease, cancer, kidney disease, Alzheimer’s disease, and chronic lung disease are rampant in this country. Shouldn’t individuals living with these conditions get to choose whether they want to take their chances on the COVID shot in the hopes that the benefits of the drug will outweigh the risks? And regardless of health status or age, shouldn’t everyone get to make that risk assessment for themselves and their children?

It truly has never been more important to improve your overall health and the health of your loved ones. Be sure to explore more of NaturalHealth365’s healthy living topics to protect your well-being now and in the future.
